alert.note: Alert for Inland Southern Brevard; Mainland Northern Brevard; Mainland Southern Brevard; Northern Brevard Barrier Islands; Southern Brevard Barrier Islands (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 12 at 6:15PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Brevard County through 700 PM EDT... At 615 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Cocoa, moving northeast at 20 mph. Additional strong storms will move northeast toward Cape Canaveral and the barrier islands through 7 PM. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 45 to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Palm Bay, Melbourne, Titusville, Rockledge and Cocoa. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or hard-topped vehicle. Remember, when thunder roars, go indoors!
